7.2 7.2 In any case, the warranty for defects of conformity of the vehicle with respect to the state of use agreed between the parties is 12 (twelve) months from the delivery, renouncing In any case, the warranty for defects of conformity of the vehicle with respect to the state of use agreed between the parties is 12 (twelve) months from the delivery,
the buyer expressly giving up to any other extended warranty. Under penalty of forfeiture, the buyer must report defects of conformity and/or flaws to the seller in writing, expressly asking the buyer to an extended warranty. Under penalty of forfeiture, the buyer must report the defects and/or flaws to the seller in writing,
preferably by registered letter with acknowledgement of receipt, within two months from the date the defect was discovered. preferably by registered letter with acknowledgement of receipt, within two months from the date the defect was discovered.
